summary: The customer was interested in upgrading their Contoso Wireless internet service and the agent provided them with a rundown of the different packages available. The customer chose the 50 Mbps package, which costs $69.99 per month and includes free installation and 24/7 customer support. The agent also informed the customer that there are discounts and promotions available if they upgrade their service, as well as bundle deals if they are interested in adding additional services such as TV or phone services to their account.
